com.intel.fightclub.cloud.broadcast

Class OutOfSyncBroadcast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.cloud.broadcast.OutOfSyncBroadcast

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class OutOfSyncBroadcast
extends java.lang.Object
    Informs about cloud sync state.

      • ACTION_CLOUD_OUT_OF_SYNC

        @NonNull
 @NonNls
public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CLOUD_OUT_OF_SYNC
        Cloud out of sync broadcast action.

        This action is only used by a receiver defined in AndroidManifest.xml.

    • Method Detail

      • sendBroadcast

        public static void sendBroadcast(@NonNull
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 @NonNull
                                 java.lang.String lastServerBackupHash,
                                 boolean isInSync)
        Sends a broadcast informing about cloud sync status.

        This broadcast is used for showing notification when out of sync and also during backup files upload when user logs out.

        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        lastServerBackupHash - The last backup hash.
        isInSync - true if backup is in sync with cloud.
